answer:
FluMist® is not available in Canada for the 2019-2020 flu season. All available flu vaccines are by given by injection. 
Use our influenza (flu) clinic locator to find a flu clinic near you. Please note that pharmacies only immunize children 5 years of age and older. You can also contact your local health unit for information on flu clinics in your area. 
Immunization Nurse
question: Where can my child get a flu mist instead of a flu shot. I live on commercial drive. Thank you

question_variation_1: where can my child get flu mist instead of flu shot
question_variation_2: where can my child get instead of flu shot flu shot?
